title: Bloomberg Markets: King on Cisco's Push Into Software, Services
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: King on Cisco's Push Into Software, Services
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Ian King Semiconductor Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing Cisco Systems Inc., whose machines form the backbone of the internet, predicted another revenue decline as the company tries to remake itself amid a changing networking industry.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
